title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.32 - Officials in attendance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.32 - Officials in attendance

State Regulations

At every contest or exhibition the ring officials in
attendance shall consist of at least one referee, three judges, one timekeeper, one knockdown counter and one announcer, unless otherwise directed or
specifically approved by the Commission. In addition, for all boxing contests
or exhibitions, there shall be at least two physicians in attendance at
ringside, unless a greater number is directed by the

Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

211.32

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
